rooms.description: Spacious Scandinavian styled living room with minimalistic design and ample natural light.
Sleek dining area adjacent to the kitchen for social gatherings.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with efficient layout and built-in storage solutions.
Spacious master bedroom with Vastu aligned north-east orientation and attached walk-in closet.
Guest bedroom placed on the south side adhering to local building norms.
Compact third bedroom designed for flexibility and additional space usage.
Efficiently planned bathroom with Vastu considerations ensuring privacy and proper drainage.

openings.name: front_door
openings.description: Primary entrance designed for natural light entry while maintaining Scandinavian simplicity.

openings.name: side_windows
openings.description: Multiple small windows placed on the east wall for morning sunlight and to maintain privacy.

openings.name: balcony_access
openings.description: Balcony that opens into the living area for an outdoor feel and adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.name: pool_access
openings.description: Direct access point to the swimming pool integrated into the ground floor layout.

additional_features.name: swimming_pool
additional_features.description: In-ground swimming pool designed on a corner plot to maximize space and provide an outdoor leisure area.

additional_features.name: storage_space
additional_features.description: Compact storage unit for utilities and seasonal items following budget constraints.
